text: Gei Dimaadua ga helekai gi Samuel, “Goe hudee mmada gi di looloo be go di madanga o tangada, ma hagalee deenaa go dagu dangada ne hilihili aga. Agu hagamaanadu la hagalee hai be di hagamaanadu o nia daangada. Nia daangada le e mmada hua gi tuaidina dangada laa daha, gei Au e mmada gi lodo o tangada mo ono ada haga maanadu.”16.7 Luke 16.15
